summary: Digital marketing automation platform with AI agent capabilities. Building incrementally in smaller steps to avoid build errors. Features include: campaign management, content scheduling, analytics, lead management, webhook automation, smart task agent, campaign autopilot, intelligent webhook agent, decision support engine, and workflow automation builder.
architectural_notes: Build is being done incrementally in smaller steps to avoid AI build errors
No direct social media posting, email sending, or live external AI model connections (platform limits)
known_issues: Full digital marketing automation build failed twice — now breaking into smaller incremental steps

existing_features.title: Create a Smart Task Agent page at route '/smart-task-agent'. The page must include: (1) An auto-task generator form where the user enters a goal and the app breaks it down into actionable steps displayed as a checklist. (2) A priority queue panel that lists tasks ranked by deadline and dependency — tasks can be marked complete, reordered by priority (High/Medium/Low), and have a due date. (3) A task completion tracker that, when a task is marked done, auto-suggests the next logical step from the remaining queue. All task data must be persisted to localStorage.

Create a Campaign Autopilot page at route '/campaign-autopilot'. The page must include: (1) A content auto-scheduler section where the user defines optimal posting windows (day of week + time of day) per platform, and scheduled posts from the backend are surfaced in that order. (2) A campaign health monitor panel that reads existing ad campaign data (spend, CTR, conversions) and flags campaigns as Healthy, At Risk, or Underperforming based on user-defined thresholds. (3) A performance summary generator that, on demand or on a set daily/weekly schedule stored in localStorage, produces a plain-text summary card of campaign activity. All configuration must be persisted to localStorage.

Add an 'AI Agent' navigation group to the AppSidebar containing links to '/smart-task-agent' (Smart Task Agent) and '/campaign-autopilot' (Campaign Autopilot). The group should appear after the existing Digital Marketing section and use a bot/robot icon consistent with the app's dark teal design system.

new_feature_requests.summary: Campaign planner with goal tracking, content library, post scheduler, and content calendar

Lead capture forms, contact list, audience segmentation, and follow-up task reminders
Webhook receiver, integration hub with documented endpoints, import/export flows

Campaign autopilot: auto-schedule content, campaign health monitor, auto-generate performance summaries

Decision support engine: recommendation panel, weekly briefing, pattern/trend detection
Workflow automation builder: visual rule creator, multi-step workflow chains, recurring templates
